title: Study for "I'm Cold BIlly, Can't Stop Shaking," from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
description: Man in full view wearing nothing but a towel around his waist; he stands facing in the direction of the viewer; the words \"I\'m Cold Billy/Can\'t Stop Shaking\" scrawled in UR quadrant
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
